# NSMenu.SelectionMode.selectOne

**Case**

A selection mode where someone can select at most one menu item in the same selection group at the same time.

## Declaration

```swift
case selectOne
```

## Discussion

A change in selection deselects any previously selected item.

## Defining the selection mode

- **NSMenu.SelectionMode.automatic**: A selection mode where the menu determines the appropriate selection mode based on the context and its constants.
- **NSMenu.SelectionMode.selectAny**: A selection mode where someone can select multiple items in the menu.
